taskDescription:
Explain the error in the following calculation: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mn>45</mn>
      <mn>8</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mn>6</mn>
      <mn>8</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mn>94</mn>
      <mn>8</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{45_8} \times {6_8} = {94_8}</annotation></semantics></math>.
